caption.center: William P. Fogarty, Respondent, v. Sarah A. O'Reilly, as Executrix of and
Trustee under the Last Will and Testament of Hugh O'Reilly, Deceased,
Appellant, Impleaded with Mary A. Stange and Others.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed, with costs, with leave to defendant to withdraw demurrer and answer on payment of costs. No opinion.
